title: Course overview
text:
This is the homepage for MATH 1700 - Modern Elementary Statistics by Dr. Mehdi Maadooliat in Fall 2025 at Marquette University. All course materials will be posted on this site.
You can find the course syllabus here and the course schedule here.

title: R cheatsheets
text: The following cheatsheets come from https://posit.co/resources/cheatsheets. We haven’t covered every function and functionality listed on them, but you might still find them useful as references.

title: Modern Elementary Statistics - Fall 2025
text:
This page contains an outline of the topics, content, and assignments for the semester. Note that this schedule will be updated as the semester progresses, and the timeline of topics and assignments might be updated throughout the semester.









WEEK
DATE
TOPIC
MATERIALS
DUE




1
Tue, Aug 26
Introduction, Math Review, What is Statistics?  🎥 Lecture 1 (part one), 🎥 Lecture 1 (part two)  Sorry😔 no audio! 🔇
💻Chapt 1 Math Review, 1






Thu, Aug 28
Graphs, Frequency distributions, Histogram  🎥 Lecture 2
💻Chapt 2A 2.1, 2.2, 2.3, 2.4






Fri, Aug 29
📃1st week Summary


📝 HW 0: Register in Webassign


2
Tue, Sep 2
Box-Plot, z-scores  🎥 Lecture 3
💻Chapt 2B 2.5






Thu, Sep 4
Bivariate Data, Linear Correlation and Regression  🎥 Lecture 4
💻Chapt 3 3.1, 3.2, 3.3






Fri, Sep 5
📃2nd week Summary


📝 HW 1 at 11:50 pm


3
Tue, Sep 9

💻Chapt 4 4.1, 4.2






Thu, Sep 11

4.3, 4.4, 4.5






Fri, Sep 12
📃3rd week Summary


📝 HW 2 at 11:50 pm
